summary: Crime fighter Terry Sneed arrives in New Mexico to help out a local police chief - but he's already taking money from the underworld.
cast: Billy Dee Williams|Eddie Albert|Frankie Avalon|Sorrell Booke|Tracy Reed|Albert Salmi|Vic Morrow|A Martinez|James Luisi|John Davis Chandler|William Sargent|Vernon Weddle|Kathrine Baumann|Dick Yarmy|Kathleen Hughes|Robert Miller Driscoll|Vic Perrin
title: Doble juego
